settings.title: Organic
settings.subtitle: The coffee in our pods is certified organic by the Soil Association and ethically sourced from sustainable farms around the world.

settings.title: Compostable
settings.subtitle: Compostable pods, totally free from nasty plastics. We deliver every order carbon-positive - that's 40,000 trees protected, and counting!

settings.title: Subscribe & Save
settings.subtitle: Get your Grind tin, refill it with letterbox-friendly (free from plastic) refills and save 20% compared to an individual order.

settings.title:
Great coffee,
at home.
settings.content_body:
Get a refillable tin with your choice of compostable coffee pods, whole bean or ground coffee for just £9.95.

Our compostable coffee pods are filled with organic coffee and compatible with your Original style Nespresso® machine.

settings.title: What do we mean by 'doing good'?
settings.text:
We're an independent company based in Shoreditch, London - not an evil offshore empire. We're proud to pay our taxes in the UK, and to have created employment for more than 150 people in London.

We make long-term decisions, putting sustainability and quality first, and we're owned by our regulars, who have supported our growth through three record breaking rounds of crowdfunding

settings.subtitle_1: All of our coffee is certified organic by the Soil Association. That means that we don't use any genetically modified produce or harmful pesticides in our coffee.
settings.subtitle_2: We work with smallholders around the world - empowering them to grow their farms, invest in their community and continue to make us the best coffee in the world.
settings.subtitle_3: We’ve offset the carbon emissions of 100,000 orders and counting - protecting over 40,000 trees in the Jari Pará conservation project in the Amazon.
settings.subtitle_4: Our customers have rated our coffee, and our customer service, as Excellent on Trustpilot.

settings.title: The best coffee, at home.
settings.subtitle: Get your first coffee delivery for just £9.95, with free shipping. That's over 25% off the perfect cup of coffee at home.
settings.shipping_info: Free carbon-positive shipping, forever, when you subscribe.
settings.free_tin_info: You'll get a free pink Grind tin with your first delivery.
settings.product_quantity: Choose from 30x Nespresso® Compatible Pods or 454g of whole bean or ground coffee.
settings.product_price: Het your Starter Box for <font color="green">£9.95</font> (<strike>£13.50</strike>), with a refillable Grind tin and free shipping.

settings.iconSubtitle: <small>Pick from our four Grind coffee blends in Nespresso® pod, whole bean, or ground coffee.</small>
<small>Receive Grind coffee as and when you need it - you can edit, pause or cancel your refills at any time.</small>
<small>Get a free Grind tin with your first order and free carbon positive shipping with every delivery.</small>

settings.title: A small change, a big difference.
settings.text: 29,000 plastic and aluminium pods go to landfilll every minute. When composted, Grind coffee pods break down in weeks - but even in landfill they'll break down hundreds of times faster than their plastic or aluminium cousins.

settings.title: Better for the planet - compostable pods, free from plastic
Only great coffee - specialty-grade and always organic
Independent British business, based in London
Get started for £9.95. If you love them, you'll pay £13.50/month for a 30 pod subscription
Plastic and aluminium pods - contributing to the 29,000 pods going to landfill every minute
Owned by Nestlé, a Swiss conglomerate

settings.bodyText: There are a Iot of coffee pods out there. Ours are compostable and filled with organic coffee, ethically sourced from sustainable farms. We think they're better than Nespresso's own pods, but we'll let you decide.
